Value.label: Temperature/ Humidity report interval
Value.Help: Used to adjust the time between report interval for Temperature and humidity reports.

Value.label: Temperature delta value
Value.Help: 0 - Reporting temperature based on change is disabled 5 to 50 - 0.5 to 5°C (Default 10, 1.0°C)

Value.label: Humidity delta value
Value.Help: 0 - Reporting humidity based on change is disabled 5 to 50 - 0.5 to 5% (Default 10, 1.0%)

Value.label: Temperature offset settings
Value.Help: Calibrate the internal sensor. NB! To set negative values; 65 535 – desired value + 1.

Value.label: Humidity offset settings
Value.Help: Offsets the measured relative humidity. NB! To set negative values; 65 535 – desired value + 1

Value.label: Proximity sensor Enable / Disable
Value.Help: Choose if proximity sensor is used or not.

Value.label: LED maximum brightness
Value.Help: Adjust the backlight of LCD display.

Value.label: LED turned on before timeout
Value.Help: Adjust the time from proximity sensor / display touched until display goes to sleep.

Value.label: Temperature Control Hysteresis
Value.Help: Adjust the delta values for the thermostat to turn on off heating.

Value.label: External Relay and Operating State update interval
Value.Help: Set time on how often the devices sends Binary Switch Set and thermostat mode to gateway.

Value.label: Report when presence is detected
Value.Help: Decides if the thermostat sends temperature when presence is detected.
